************************************************************
f0001: Cause-Effect links
************************************************************

CASE: 1
Stag: 16 
	Pattern: 55 [['according', 'to']]---- [['&R', '(,)'], ['&NP@C@']]
	sentTXT: A good summary should be able to quickly attract attention , represent the core idea , and effectively convey the meaning according to interests .
	Cause: interests
	Effect: A good summary should be able to quickly attract attention , represent the core idea , and effectively convey the meaning

CASE: 2
Stag: 18 
	Pattern: 79 [['since']]---- [['&R@NCTime@', '(,)'], ['&C@NCTime@']]
	sentTXT: The development of cyberspace accelerates the expansion of texts since people can more and more easily and freely publish writings .
	Cause: people can more and more easily and freely publish writings .
	Effect: The development of cyberspace accelerates the expansion of texts

CASE: 3
Stag: 19 
	Pattern: 76 [['because']]---- [['&R', '(,)', '(&ADV)'], ['&C']]
	sentTXT: Efficiently finding necessary contents in the ocean of texts is very important because life is short while new texts are continually generated .
	Cause: life is short while new texts are continually generated .
	Effect: Efficiently finding necessary contents in the ocean of texts is very important

	Cause: Researchers have to focus on the literature within recent years
	Effect: more and more reinventions

f0018: Cause-Effect links
************************************************************

************************************************************
f0024: Cause-Effect links
************************************************************

CASE: 1

************************************************************
f0031: Cause-Effect links
************************************************************

CASE: 1

	Effect: the data remain widely distributed rather than gathered

CASE: 3
